parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Extend
parameters.description: Specifies whether the fuzzy search by account name is supported. If you want to use fuzzy search, set the parameter to **1**. If you set the parameter to a different value or leave the parameter empty, fuzzy search is not supported.

parameters.name: IsRoot
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the account has root permissions. Valid values:

*   **0**: no
*   **1**: yes

parameters.name: LastLoginTimeEnd
parameters.description: The timestamp of the last logoff from the account. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: LastLoginTimeStart
parameters.description: The timestamp of the last logon to the account. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The name or IP address of the server.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: The name of the account to which the server belongs.
